attributes.action: consider changing the NI numbers of those affected by the missing HMG data discs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of the fact that the missing discs  containing personal information of almost half the UK population have not come to light, we should begin to assume a "worst case" scenario in that the discs have found their way into the hands of criminals.

Bearing in mind that the data are fundamental to our identities, remedial action needs to be taken to protect the future of our children. It is not only the current adult population that faces having their identities stolen but an entire generation of (future) adults.

We who have signed this petition request that the government consider replacing all our National Insurance Numbers thus helping to render the missing data useless with regard to stealing identities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
